pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Pick colors from the palette and assign on 3D view

content.raw:
Just want to check if this is a bug or a UI choice: when I have a color selected and mouse over an item, the preview color layers over the existing color of the object. When I click on it, it changes to the desired color.

(I'm taking care of conflicts with default right now btw)
content.html:
Just want to check if this is a bug or a UI choice: when I have a color selected and mouse over an item, the preview color layers over the existing color of the object. When I click on it, it changes to the desired color.

(I'm taking care of conflicts with default right now btw)
